mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.review_id as reviewId, c.user_id as userId, u.nickname, u.user_login_id as userLoginId, c.content, c.created_at as createdAt FROM review_comments c JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.review_id = #{reviewId} ORDER BY c.created_at ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review_comments (review_id, user_id, content) VALUES (#{reviewId}, #{userId}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE review_comments SET content = #{content}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
